G

generateNgrams(String, int, int) - Static method in class langModel.NgramUtils
Method parsing the given sentence and generate all the combinations of ngrams, by varying the order n between the given minOrder and maxOrder.
getCounts(String) - Method in class langModel.NgramCounts
 
getCounts(String) - Method in interface langModel.NgramCountsInterface
Getter of the data structure which maps the n-grams to the counts and return the count of a particular n-gram.
getHistory(String, int) - Static method in class langModel.NgramUtils
Method parsing a n-gram and returning its history, i.e. the n-1 preceding words.
getLMOrder() - Method in interface langModel.LanguageModelInterface
Getter of the language model order.
getLMOrder() - Method in class langModel.NaiveLanguageModel
 
getMaximalOrder() - Method in class langModel.NgramCounts
 
getMaximalOrder() - Method in interface langModel.NgramCountsInterface
Getter of the maximal order of the n-grams in the training corpus.
getNgramCounterSize() - Method in class langModel.NgramCounts
 
getNgramCounterSize() - Method in interface langModel.NgramCountsInterface
Getter of the data structure which maps the n-grams to the counts and return the number of mapped n-grams.
getNgramProb(String) - Method in interface langModel.LanguageModelInterface
Method computing and returning the probability of the given n-gram, using the NgramCountsInterface structure.
getNgramProb(String) - Method in class langModel.LaplaceLanguageModel
 
getNgramProb(String) - Method in class langModel.NaiveLanguageModel
 
getNgrams() - Method in class langModel.NgramCounts
 
getNgrams() - Method in interface langModel.NgramCountsInterface
Getter of the data structure which maps the n-grams to the counts and return the set of n-grams present in the structure.
getSentenceProb(String) - Method in interface langModel.LanguageModelInterface
Method computing and returning the probability of the given sentence, according to its n-grams.
getSentenceProb(String) - Method in class langModel.NaiveLanguageModel
 
getSequenceSize(String) - Static method in class langModel.NgramUtils
Method counting the number of words in a given sequence (the sequence can be a n-gram or a sentence).
getSize() - Method in class langModel.Vocabulary
 
getSize() - Method in interface langModel.VocabularyInterface
Getter of the size of the vocabulary
getStringOOV(String, VocabularyInterface) - Static method in class langModel.NgramUtils
Method parsing a sequence of words and returning the modified string where out-of-vocabulary words are replaced with the OOV tag.
getTotalWordNumber() - Method in class langModel.NgramCounts
 
getTotalWordNumber() - Method in interface langModel.NgramCountsInterface
Getter of the total number of words attribute.
getWords() - Method in class langModel.Vocabulary
 
getWords() - Method in interface langModel.VocabularyInterface
Method returning the list of words of the vocabulary.
